name: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill
short_description: Oven-baked salmon fillets infused with the bright flavors of lemon and dill.
long_description: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill is an elegant yet easy-to-make dish featuring oven-baked salmon fillets infused with the bright and zesty flavors of lemon and dill. This healthy and delicious recipe is perfect for a special dinner.
instructions: Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon slices, and sprinkle with dill, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Bake until salmon is cooked through.
